Package Control

Class OrderControl

java.lang.Object
Control.OrderControl
public class OrderControl extends Object
This class contains the functions used to control an order.

    • createOrder

      public static void createOrder​(int staffID)
      Creates an order for the chosen table.
      Parameters:
      staffID - the staffID of the staff creating this order.

    • addFood

      private static void addFood​(Order order)
      Adds food items into an order.
      Parameters:
      order - the order to add to.

    • removeFood

      private static void removeFood​(Order order)
      Removes food item from an order.
      Parameters:
      order - the order to remove from.

    • appendOrder

      private static void appendOrder​(Order existingOrder, Order newOrder)
      Adds an order to another order.
      Parameters:
      existingOrder - the order to add to.
      newOrder - the order to add from.

    • printInvoice

      public static void printInvoice​(Order order, int tableID, boolean member)
      Prints the Invoice for an order.
      Parameters:
      order - the order to print the invoice for.
      tableID - the table ID associated to this order.
      member - the membership status of the customer associated to this order.

    • memberDiscount

      private static double memberDiscount​(Order order)
      Update this order with a members discount of 5%.
      Parameters:
      order - the order to apply the discount to.
      Returns:
      the discounted amount.
